title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite - CH20001 or equivalentHistorical background, Important applications such as transportation, mixing of particulates, coating, particle growth, adsorption, clinkerisation, roasting, synthesis reactions, cracking of hydrocarbons, carbonization, combustion, gasification etc. Merits and demerits of the system. Liquid-like properties of fluidized system. Gross behavior of fluidized bed systems. Mono and poly dispersed particles and their characteristics. Terminal setting velocity and its interaction with fluid velocity. Text Book:1.Fluidization by Max Leva2.Fluidization engineering by D. Kunni and o. Levenspiel3.Fluidization by J. F. Davidson, R. Cliff and D. Harrison
